Description: Glazed composition shabti of Psamtek Born of Nitiiriu with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, crossed hands in relief holding an incised adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket which hangs over the shoulder, the front and left side of the leg section are inscribed with columns of incised hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
